short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Qoruz Chrome extension enables you to instantly access creator insights and effortlessly add them to your campaign plan.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qoruz Chrome extension lets you to instantly analyse social influencers on the go and provides reach, engagement, Qoruz score, content category and contact details for the influencers.
